data.name: Fantasy battle islands
data.detailed_description:
Let's go on an adventure on our little island. We capture enemy islands and increase our own. We place different types of troops on the island and fight with a stronger enemy.

Go through the most unusual levels and locations with your battle island. Defeat strong bosses, create the strangest shaped island.

Try a variety of combat mechanics. Learn to defeat a variety of monsters and heroes. Lead your island to victory!

  • Correct forms of the island give additional bonuses
  • Beware of mines
  • Remove part of the island if you need money or can't sail
  • Heroes will defend their island until their last breath

data.short_description: Let's go on an adventure on our little island. We capture enemy islands and increase our island. We place different types of troops on the island and fight with a stronger enemy.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core, 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 / RX 460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 Ti / RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
